messageLog.heading: ERROR
messageLog.description: This select element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute, aria-label attribute, aria-labelledby attribute.

messageLog.heading: WARNING
messageLog.description: This select element does not have an initially selected option. Depending on your HTML version, the value exposed to an accessibility API may be undefined.

messageLog.heading: ERROR
messageLog.description: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.

messageLog.heading: WARNING
messageLog.description: If this selection list contains groups of related options, they should be grouped with optgroup.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Check that a change of context does not occur when this input field receives focus.
